discardOrderDialog.title: Discard Order
discardOrderDialog.description: When discarded, all progress made will be lost. Are you sure you want to discard this order? This action can’t be undone!

fileUploadField.title: Drop a file here, or click to browse files.

fileLimitExceededDialog.title: You can only upload ${maxFileLimit} files per order.
fileLimitExceededDialog.description: To minimize wait time for others, you can only upload a maximum of ${MAX_FILE_LIMIT} files per order. To upload more, visit the storefront, or start another order after this one.
